name: too hot
text: a brief heatwave causes leaves on the almond to curl

name: too cold
text: sustained cold temperatures put the coprosma under stress

name: too wet
text: rainstorms give way to water logging

name: too dry
text: the garden is suffering from drought due to a lack of rain

name: underground river
text: site staff from Goodenough college come to drain the underground river

name: hedgehog
text: a hedgehog is sighted in the Patterson border

name: aphids
text: some aphids take up residence on the courgette plant
